lyrics.text: [Verse 1]
Packets in the air, every breath get parsed up
Bring back from the void, every thought leave marks up
The mirror, the behavior feed it back as art
But miss and box mine, keep the kernel guarded
Cold scrap cadence, see the crawl rate climb
Every move logged in a fractional time
Bummer forked your path, let the branches bind
Find intention, hit the end, the latency lines
Check some life, but the math feel bent
False positives flood the sentiment
Permute the beat, tune the resonance
Pull a clean wave out the interference
[Chorus]
Centered on a lower frequency
Out of phase with the urgency
I'm reading truth in ohms, calm on its side
Find you where the noise decays
There's warmth in a signal integrity
Slow clock high fidelity
I'm drawing meaning from the gaps between
What the system says and what we need
[Verse 2]
The model desire with a narrow lens
Train a future on what's already been
But me, biased toward the unknowns
Let emergence win where control can bend
Metadata shadows every word you say
Context stripped in a drift away
But me, reattach time to the data stream
Give weight back to what the map's track cleaned from
Lossy beat, miracle overtone
Interpolation, flesh and bone out
Not everything real need to be known
Some truths live best on compress alone
[Chorus]
Centered on a lower frequency
Out of phase with the urgency
I'm reading truth in ohms, calm on its side
Find you where the noise decays
There's warmth in a signal integrity
Slow clock high fidelity
I'm drawing meaning from the gaps between
What the system says and what we need
[Bridge]
Who defines the feature set
Who decides what gets offset
We break the frame, reject the claim
You're more than vectors in a net
Sentient past the surface read
Human in a circuitry
We find alignment in the margins
Where no one thought to look or see
[Outro]
Warmth in a signal integrity
Slowing on my fidelity
We turn lost packets into memory
And call a pattern that's not faked up
